about_the_game:
Agarest Zero - DLC Bundle #1


Bundle #1 contains the following three packs:

Daily Extension Pack:
Carrot sword
Super scallion
Lollipop stick
Classic kettle
Pot lid
Kaopectate

Formidable Pack:
Chickapede alert
Man fist
Drying typhoon
Paw booties
Gaspode

Extra Points Pack 3:
1000000 Gold
750 PP
2500 TP
500000 EP

name: Agarest Zero - DLC Bundle #1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 64Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 128Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
